# byt5-small-finetune-v3

This model is a fine-tuned version of [PhongLT/byt5-small-finetune-v2](https://huggingface.co/PhongLT/byt5-small-finetune-v2) on an unknown dataset.
It achieves the following results on the evaluation set:
- Loss: 0.0537
- Rouge1: 51.7178
- Rouge2: 45.6574
- Rougel: 51.5894
- Rougelsum: 51.5576
- Gen Len: 19.0

## Training procedure

### Training hyperparameters

The following hyperparameters were used during training:
- learning_rate: 5e-05
- train_batch_size: 4
- eval_batch_size: 4
- seed: 42
- optimizer: Adam with betas=(0.9,0.999) and epsilon=1e-08
- lr_scheduler_type: linear
- num_epochs: 5
